cast.name: 蒂博·德·蒙塔朗贝尔 Thibault de Montalembert
洛尔·玛尔萨克 Laure Marsac
Randa Chahal Sabag Randa Chahal Sabag

awards:
第50届洛迦诺国际电影节(1997)
　　金豹奖 最佳影片(提名) Randa Chahal Sabag

director.name: Randa Chahal Sabag Randa Chahal Sabag

introduction: The story takes place in an around Lebanon. It concerns Farid, a repentant Islamic fundamentalist and Charles, a French diplomat. Farid is prepared to give the French secret service a list of names of terrorists operating in France on the condition that they liberate a friend of his imprisoned in France. The deal is complicated by the fact that Farid and Charles are irresistably attracted to each other, which inflames great jealously in Charles' wife, Juliette, estranging the couple. Farid seduces Charles for the challange and Charles gives in.
